data.content:
adjective
not limiting or controlling something
It's a nonrestrictive diet that stresses eating smaller portions rather than not eating certain foods.
You'll be moving around a lot, so wear nonrestrictive clothing. [=clothes that do not make it difficult to move freely]
grammar of a word or group of words :describing or giving more information about a person or thing but not needed to understand which person or thing is meant
In the sentence My brother, who works at a restaurant, just got his first car, who works at a restaurant is a nonrestrictive clause. - compare restrictive
